input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Acoustic Research PR190N Component Video 3 pc Red/Blue/Green w/males ends (3 feet) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)

Product features:
24K gold plating
Precision machined 8 segment connectors
Nitrogen injected dielectric
Multi-shielded design
Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response A:
AR Pro Series II component video cable carries signals along three separate paths to achieve optimum picture quality. 24K gold-plated, split center pin and an 8 segment RCA connector delivers precise connections and lowers signal resistance for enhanced picture clarity. A multi-shielded design (two 95% copper braids and 100% aluminum Mylar foil) provide optimum isolation from EMI and RFI interference for enhanced picture clarity. A nitrogen-injected foam dielectric maintains 75 Ohm impedance for optimum video signal transfer while the solid 99.97% pure, silver-coated, oxygen-free, copper center conductor provides exceptional signal transfer for accurate video reproduction. 3' length.
Product features:
*24K gold plating
*Precision machined 8 segment connectors
*Nitrogen injected dielectric
*Multi-shielded design
*Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response B: This Acoustic Research (AR) video component cable is of higher quality than most standard audio/video cables giving you a cleaner, clearer picture and sound. The three-piece set of red, blue, and green cables are each 1.5 meters (4.9 feet) long.  The multi-shielded design, nitrogen injected dielectric, and pure silver coated oxygen-free copper all work together to provide an improved signal transmission.  The 24K gold plating on the precision machined 8 segment connectors ensures long-lasting, corrosion-free connections.  The male end of the cables are standard RCA connectors.
